name: Mystic Valley
description:
Welcome to the Mʏsᴛɪᴄ Vᴀʟʟᴇʏ! Collect coins to buy items and power ups from the shop. Make sure to watch out for dangerous critters! Reach safe ground to complete your journey.
✦✦✦How to play✦✦✦
➜ Defeat critters by jumping on them
➜ Collect coins. Use them to buy stuff in the shop
➜ [T] to chat, [#] or [letter] to choose phrase
➜ TAP on player to chat (mobile)
➜ [N] to toggle names
